Name: Caf√© Oporto
Review Text: Stumbled across this friendly and lively little bar and it turned out to be one of the highlights of our trip. Staff and locals were friendly and welcoming and the atmosphere was superb.  The beer was excellent. Definitely visit if you get chance.

Name: Caf√© Oporto
Review Text: Fantastic bar with a friendly staff, VERY welcoming and great beer selection. There were locals here that we ended up chatting with and I think it was Jeanie who said the zodiac signs behind / around the bar are about 100 years old. This is, overall, a great brown bar that we ended up visiting twice - HIGHLY recommend!

Name: Caf√© Oporto

Review Text: Wise cracks, good music, friendly faces and a decent price for beer right in the centrum at Cafe Oporto. It's always great craic with the locals, expats and visitors here. As one patron said,"this place makes me feel normal" 😂😂👌

Name: Caf√© Oporto

Review Text: Back here then found out it,s a friends birthday later. Oh dear me.

Name: Caf√© Oporto
Review Text: Love this Bar. My home from home whenever I'm in town. Great staff every time, nice relaxed atmosphere (it's not a coffeeshop and I am not a toker!), great pints. A must for a pit stop when you're passing by, trust me. Can't say enough about the place, a hidden gem.

Name: Caf√© Oporto
Review Text: Step back in time. Well worth a visit, many original features, old fireplace and paintings on wooden wall panels. Welcoming staff comfy atmosphere. Bar opened 1889. A little gem to enhance your visit to old Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© Oporto

Name: Caf√© Oporto
